original_text: Also it was allowed to make war on the saints and to conquer them. And authority was given it over every tribe and people and language and nation,
korean_text: 또 권세를 받아 성도들과 싸워 이기게 되고 각 족속과 백성과 방언과 나라를 다스리는 권세를 받으니

sentences.original_text: Also it was allowed to make war on the saints
over every tribe and people and language and nation,
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 족속과 백성과 언어와 민족을 다스리는 권세였습니다
